ml.control

Class ID3Singleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.control.ID3Singleton

  • public class ID3Singleton
extends java.lang.Object
    ID3Singleton class

    Class that adds state properties to the use of the ID3Learning class, so as to support a GUI.

    Author:
    Gabriel
